item.title: WATCH: Dramatic moment first responders save firefighter after explosion
item.description: First responders raced to rescue a firefighter who became trapped under rubble moments after a house exploded in Illinois.

item.title: A US-Russian crew of 3 launches to the International Space Station
item.description: NASA astronaut Jonny Kim and two Russian crewmates have arrived at the International Space Station on board a Russian spacecraft

item.title: Trump tariffs live updates: China will fight US trade war 'to the end', official says
item.description: Trump's universal 10% levy against all countries went into effect early Saturday.
